alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 3:24PM EDT until March 12 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Berrien County in south central Georgia... Lanier County in south central Georgia... Northeastern Lowndes County in south central Georgia... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 324 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Nashville to near Ray City to near Hahira, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Valdosta, Ray City, Moody Air Force Base, Meigs, Naylor, Courthouse, Greenwood, Barretts, Hansell, Bannockburn, Weber, Stockton and Teeterville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for south central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for south central Georgia.
